Action.author: ynamiki
Action.body: ~odowdaibm , The document has both American and British spelling (organization/organisation, etc.). Since labels in configuration file (configtx.yaml), standard configuration directory (crypto-config/peerOrganizations) and many identifiers in source codes use American spelling, can I replace British spelling in the docuement?

Action.author: ynamiki
Action.body: I opened a new issue for American/British spelling: FAB-9523.

Action.author: odowdaibm
Action.body: Feel free â€“ I'd argue about your title though;) Thanks!
